name: Castle Blitz
description:
We made a game where the map grows after every wave, spawning unique enemies and new tiles. As you progress, you grow your arsenal of weapons to fight back against the sieging undead. Don't let them destroy your castle!

Player Controls --

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Pan Camera

Middle Mouse - Center Camera

Kill all enemies AND spawners to finish the wave

Spawners are tiles with a orange highlight that endlessly spawn new enemies. Destroy them fast or you will be overwhalmed!
